item.title: Rate What The Person Above You Is Listening To
item.dc:creator: Cpt. Hill [Ret.]
item.description:
Quote from TSgt. Thompson on August 8, 2008:
    "Alright this is a simple little game I saw on another forum and thought I'd bring it over here, basically you just rate the track the person above you is listening to on a 1-10 scale and explain your reasoning if you like then post your own song."

The rules:
  1. You must post artist name and track name.
  2. You must provide a URL to listen to the track (YouTube, MySpace, etc).
  3. You cannot rate your own tracks.
  4. And of course no extremely negative comments if you don't like a persons song.

I'll go first:


Live - Dolphins Cry
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eBHmcORu4og

item.title: Just Quotes
item.dc:creator: Cpt. Hill [Ret.]
item.description: Keep the quotes flowing!

item.title: Picture Vs. Picture
item.dc:creator: Cpt. Hill [Ret.]
item.description:
Your pic can't beat my pic. Bring it on!

For Example, I post this...

...and someone would beat it with this.

Some Rules

  1. One picture per post.
  2. The picture you post must have some relevance to the picture you're beating.
  3. Follow all other forum rules for posting.
  4. No text or comments, let the picture speak for itself.

So, I'll start it off with...

item.dc:creator: PFC Leech [Ret.]
item.description: <h1>Post videos in here about anything and everything.</h1><br><h2>...Following all rules for posting</h2><br>I'll start with my reaction to everyone that gets a little bit too angry with the vidya...<br><br>

item.title: A legend.
item.dc:creator: PFC Dahlen
item.description:
I remember a legend.

Back in the olden days, when Darkest Hour was played
you'd be shot in the head, four houndred meters away.

A glimpse of the soldier was to be catched,
as he crouch-shot your head, unable to be snatched.

You'd fear his presence, but admire his skill,
because there where no player alike, that he couldnt kill.

Mikael, where are you? My dear Finnish friend.
We stopped hearing from you, where'd you go in the end?

Your old War-Pig, Dahlen.

item.title: Goldfish vs. Cheez-It
item.dc:creator: PFC Agee
item.description:
A simple question of which snack is better, Goldfish or Cheez-Its? (This is for the original flavor of each snack)
Type a 1 for Goldfish and a 2 for Cheez-Its.

item.title: An old friend.
item.dc:creator: PFC Treble [Ret.]
item.description:
Hello all

Just popping in to say hello and to see if theres any oldies here? hope everyone is staying safe in these uncertain times. Nice to see the 29th is still popping and doing so well!

Would be lovely to hear from some of you!

Keep safe guys,

Treb

item.title: Sup!
item.dc:creator: Pak
item.description: Just wanted to drop by and tell you all that I hope you're all safe and healthy throughout all this craziness we've been going through IRL. Just know that a positive mindset results in a new positive future. One love 29th.

Hello Everyone,

Unfortunately, I got my Steam Account hacked while I thought I was helping to someone else.

Kind Regards

Pvt.Shuster

item.title: Happy International Peacekeeper Day!
item.dc:creator: PFC Ilo
item.description:
Today is the international peacekeeper day. So congratulations and salute to all fellow peacekeepers, who might be around and following this forum.

I hope you all are in good health and safe. Also, if you want to sound off and share your stories, that would be great!

Also, if anyone has something to say about peacekeeping, feel free to do so (keeping in mind the forum rules, of course )

item.title: Off Topic Thread
item.dc:creator: Cpt. Hill [Ret.]
item.description:
Quote from Ltn. Col. Wilson:
"For those of you who do not know, this thread has no topic. Talk about whatever you want; just try not to stay on topic."

item.title: Long Time Gentlemen
item.dc:creator: Rec. Dunford
item.description:
Hope everyone is doing well during these weird times.
I see a lot of older faces have retired and see some have been promoted.
I just got a new laptop recently. I got Arma3 reinstalled and some other games.
I also purchased Squad, looking forward to finally checking it out... finally.
Bought the laptop primarily for recording music but was pretty shocked by the results for gaming wise.
See ya around!

item.title: So is this what I can expect from the 29th?
item.dc:creator: Private Stephen G. Dracocardos
item.description: First day of BCT and my fellow soldiers seemed to be wearing Berlin Urban Graffiti camouflage. Lol!! You have to love Arma 3 and it's funny glitches.

item.title: Looking for help before BCT starts
item.dc:creator: Private Stephen G. Dracocardos
item.description:
Hello there brothers in arms. My name is Pvt. Dracocardos. I was a member of the 29th briefly back in 2016 although back then I was called Pvt. Drake. This time around I decided to use my real name as I have seen at least one other Drake already in the 29th and I wanted to avoid possible confusion.

Anyway, last time I was a member there were a few problems. Firstly there was an issue with my mic setup and my voice was always heard doubled and there were a few issues with me not being able to do certain things due to incorrect setup of certain key bindings.

I was wondering if there is anyone who would be willing to join me on an Arma 3 server before BCT starts this evening just to run me through the most used key bindings that I will need and also to comment on whether my mic comes across correctly in game so that I can sort out any issues before we start. I don't want to be that guy who cuts into our BCT time while I am trying to sort out game configurations during BCT.

Any takers?

item.title: Where to return
item.dc:creator: Mango
item.description: Hello everyone new and old that is still around. I peeped through some areas to see where I should ease my way back into a community that has a foundation that will never crumble. I played in back the days of DOD as we transition to DH, Where should I join back in and where is everyone the most active so I can get my feet wet. Cheers old friends and cheers to the possible new ones.

item.title: Best photo editor similar to Photoshop that doesn't require a subscription?
item.dc:creator: T3 Chandonnet
item.description: Doesn't have to be free, but send me some suggestions please.

item.title: Bloodbath Challenge
item.dc:creator: Largos
item.description:
Hello 29th ID Members,
The Bloodbath Gaming Community would like to formally challenge you guys to a Rising Storm 2 Scrimmage. In order for this event to take place though, I need to be able to get in contact with a member of your community that is in charge or could liaison for you in this event. I've had a little difficultly to get in contact with y'all between the forums and passworded teamspeak, so hopefully someone sees this.

Please make contact with me via discord my account is Largos#6015. DM me and we can help get this set up.

Thanks,
Largos

item.title: What Headset Do You Use?
item.dc:creator: PFC Tyson [Ret.]
item.description:
While I was placing an order down for a new headset to replace the one I'm wearing now, I suddenly became curious about what kind of headsets does everyone else use at this current moment? The one I'm currently wearing right now is a Logitech Stereo Headset H250 Graphite which has done quite well in the past year I've had it but at the moment I've been getting annoyed with the sound quality in it and the fact it seems to blast out with echoes from whatever I'm doing down the microphone. If you want a price on this model it cost me about £15.

So now I've upgraded myself after asking a few mates over Facebook who I did IT with about what the next one I should get is and they gave me this:

Apparently it suited them quite well and the colour is something I like since it matches all the other items on my desk. This model is a SteelSeries Siberia V2 FullSize Headset. Cost me another £50 getting this thing but hopefully the sound quality from both my microphone and headset will be a lot better!

item.title: Scale Models?
item.dc:creator: Private Caleb R. Caron
item.description: Anyone round these parts build and scale models? I primarily build 1/35 Armour. Reply with what you build and any pictures.

item.description: Drop some songs or albums that we should listen to!

item.title: Concerning the so called benefits of spending time in a forest
item.dc:creator: Pvt. Boon
item.description: This is a link to a video about some tree fundraiser going on that's for a good cause apparently. Either way, it talks about health benefits when spending time in a forest, but how come there are people who continue to damage themselves in this type of location? After all, these so called benefits are only meant to HELP, but not completely remove one's issues. However, I'd like to hear your guys' thoughts on this topic of health benefits provided from the trees.
